mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job is created, and the process activates.
Fault Management Job presumably runs through phases including progress and data generation.
Fault Management Job triggers the creation of a Fault Management Report when appropriate conditions are met.
Fault Management Report is created, enters the progress state, data collection and reaches completion.
Fault Management Job changes its state to completed status including the final Job completion.
Buyer/Client initiates a GET request to retrieve the created Fault Management Report.
FaultManagement Report is provided back to Buyer/Client holding the relevant information.
